attributes.action: Make it compulsery for newly unemployed people to take a training course in a current skill shortage area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This will allow our country to both maximise our potential labour force and help reduce the unemplyed. At the moment the only help a person who is unemployed gets is when they have been unemployed for 6 months and that help is very very limited, and the training courses that are available worthless.
A person who is then trained can have no excuses for being unemployed if he or she has the skills for a job type that is in high demand and crying out for skilled people.

Help make our country a world leader again instead of one filled with unskilled, deadend job workers or unemployable workshy people.
Sign this petition today.
